model

Class BarModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BarModel

  • public class BarModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Bar. A Bar consists of a starting width, a starting y position, a width, an y position and a Player. Player is an instance of PlayerModel which represents the player that is linked to the Bar.
    Author:
    Daniel and Oscar

      Constructor for a Bar.

      • BarModel

    • Method Detail

      • moveDown

        public void moveDown(long delta_t,
                     java.awt.Dimension FieldSize)
        This method moves the Bar's position down, i.e. increases the y position. The Bar does not move if it is at the bottom of the game field.
        Parameters:
        delta_t - The time since the previous time the game's compute method was called.
        FieldSize - The size of the game field.

      • moveUp

        public void moveUp(long delta_t)
        This method moves the Bar's position up, i.e. decreases the y position. The Bar does not move if it is at the top of the game field.
        Parameters:
        delta_t - The time since the previous time the game's compute method was called.

      • setWidth

        public boolean setWidth(int width)
        Setter for the Bar's width. The width only updates if the new value is greater than 0.
        Parameters:
        width - The new width to set to the Bar's width.
        Returns:
        True if the width was successfully updated.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Getter for the Bar's width.
        Returns:
        The Bar's width.

      • setYPosition

        public void setYPosition(int yPosition)
        Setter for the Bar's y position.
        Parameters:
        yPosition - The new y position to update to.

      • getYPosition

        public int getYPosition()
        Getter for the Bar's y position.
        Returns:
        The Bar's y position.

      • getPlayer

        public PlayerModel getPlayer()
        Getter for the player that is linked to the Bar
        Returns:
        The player that is linked to the Bar.

      • decreaseWidth

        public void decreaseWidth(int decreaseWith)
        Method that decreases the width of the bar. The width is only updated if the current width greater than 50 + decreaseWith, else it is set to 50.
        Parameters:
        decreaseWith - The value to decrease the width with.

      • resetBar

        public void resetBar()
        Resets the Bar to the starting width and position.

      • resetY

        public void resetY()
        Resets the Bar to the starting y position.
